title: Dumb Zombie Online
description: Dumb Zombie is a shooting physics game. If you like puzzles, shooting, and hate zombies then this is the perfect game for you. It is just you vs zombies, so make sure to stop the endless angry hordes before you run out of bullets. Aim your weapon and destroy all enemies on the screen to complete the levels. Earn money and buy new skins, clothes, and weapons to upgrade your player. Complete all levels to unlock new game modes and unleash the blood.
instructions: Use the mouse or touch to aim and shoot.

title: Donut Shooter
description: A fun game which you will match all the same donuts and to pop them before they pass through line. The sweetness in this game depends on your play so match them as you can. Enjoy!
instructions: Shoot all the donuts, just like a bubble shooter!

title: Call of Tanks
description: Call of Tanks is easy to play RTS game. You have to deploy tanks in the battle field to defeat your opponent. Deploying the right units as a perfect combination is the key to win the battle. Don't forget to upgrade your defenses and tanks for a stronger attack and unlock powerful bases for a stronger defense.
instructions: Drag and drop the tank card inside marked area of your base

title: Fruit Bubble Shooters
description: This is a brand new and super addictive fruit bubble shoot game, once the start, there is no way to stop. Aim and match fruit bubbles where you want to shoot them. Match 3 or more identical fruit bubbles. Use less shots to complete a level and try to earn full stars on every level.
instructions: Aim and match fruit bubbles where you want to shoot them.

title: Mountain Operation
description: This is a third person shooter on the mountain location. The mission of the game is to clear military locations from armed enemies. To fight the enemies you have 6 types of weapons, grenades, as well as military vehicles. You can explore terrain and apply your best physical fitness skills.
instructions:
WSAD, Arrows - MoveLeft
Shift - Run
Space - Jump, Car Brake
C - Crouch
LMB - Fire
RMB - Aim
R - Reload Weapon
2,3,4,5,6,7 - Change Weapon
G - Grenade
F - Get In/Get Out Car
Escape - Pause game

title: Dogod.io
description: Dogod is a multiplayer action game based on the concept of weapon evolution. Become the god of the dogs in this massive deathmatch arena. STRATEGY Kill your opponents in this dog fight arena. Level up to improve your weapons and reach new best scores. Collect food, gain coins and unlock skins, accessories and pets with your money to become the God of the Dogs
instructions: MOUSE - Move your character LEFT CLICK - Boost

title: Ramp Crash
description: Are you ready for a fun platform game with ramp collision! Choose the car you want, pass all the levels. Be the fastest, let's start the adventure.Go! Go! Go!
instructions: Played with mouse.

title: Ducklings.io
description: It's time to relax, you're a duck now. Swim around and rescue as many ducklings as possible. Dodge the reckless boats, they will hurt you. UPGRADE your home by retrieving more ducklings and get the best looking nest in the pond. By getting a bigger home you'll also unlock more funny hats. Collect all 50 hats! You can change your apearance by quacking close to your nest. Show off your nest by inviting your friends to your pond! Share the room code and start a co-op game of ducklings. There's no limit to the amount of friends you can invite, so recruite the biggest duck army possible.
instructions: Move your mouse to make the duck swim.You can also use WASD or the arrow keys.

title: Incredible Princess Eye Art
description: Welcome to an incredible tutorial from a fabulous makeup artist. Try your hand at makeup on the beautiful eyes of cute princesses. Use extraordinary artistic solutions to create a striking and non-standard look. What kind of princess will be today - a cute doll, a vamp-lady or a stylish cyber princess - you decide. Grab your makeup brush and get started! Try all the art for the eyes.
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Bubble Pop
description: Bubble Pop is a cute puzzle game! Connect 3 or more similar Bubbles to reach the level objectives within the time limit. Get coins to buy Bubble packs and buy power-ups. Match many bubbles as you can before the timer runs out. You can match different numbers of bubbles to unlock new powers into the game, these power can help you to complete the level faster. Improve your skills to complete each level and collect coins in the special mode.
instructions: Reach the objective connecting Bubbles to go to the next stage! Buy and use power ups to do each level more easy.

title: Drawing Master
description: Drawing Master is fun online game that you can play for free. Drawing Master is the fascinating game, where you will be draw the missing parts of the pictures. Have you ever dream to feel yourself as an artist? With The Drawing Master it's a not problem more! Just tap or left mouse click your screen and paint the missing parts. There is 20 levels of fun, so what are you waiting for? Have fun!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Cute Little Dragon Creator
description: Do you like dragons? Then this game is for you! Create your own unique cute little dragon; you can choose any color and many patterns and decorations, as well as eyes, wings, tail and accessories. How did your little dragon turn out? Show the screenshot in the comments.
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Mahjong Connect Deluxe
description: The Deluxe Edition of the classic game enjoyed by millions! In Mahjong Connect you must connect the mahjong pieces and clear the board! This Deluxe edition holds new features like time freeze and extra hints! Collect coins to purchase new backgrounds and tiles in the newly added shop!
instructions: Mouse and keyboard

title: Bubble Game 3 Deluxe
description: The Deluxe Edition of the classic game enjoyed by millions! In Bubble Game 3 Deluxe you must clear as many bubbles as you can. Collect coins to purchase new backgrounds and bubbles in the newly added shop! Make sure to come back every day and collect your daily coins bonus!
instructions: Use your mouse to aim and click to shoot!

title: Spooky Bubble Shooter
description: Clear the play area and save the Cherry Monster by shooting matching coloured balls. Tick tock! A simple but great bubble shooter in a spooky halloween theme!
instructions: Clear the level by shooting the bubbles.

title: Draw in
description: In this game with 75 different figures, you must cast a straight line increasing its size in order to fill the entire perimeter of the image. But be careful that the line is as correctly sized as possible (not too much, not too little). Exercise your sense of size and precision!
instructions: Hold in the screen (touch or mouse) and release when ready.

title: Jewel Magic
description: Magic jewels are here and all you have to do to get them is to match them together. Try to collect as many points as possible, win in different levels, have fun and relax at the same time.
instructions: Swap and match 3 jewels of the identical color to remove them. Match 3 or more jewels in a row to create special bombs and get more points. If you need help, try using the obtained power-ups. Gather enough points to win before you run out of moves or time.

title: Monster Truck Stunt Driving Simulation
description: Get ready to handle big wheel of Real Monster Truck on creatively designed roads. Forget everything you are free to use maximum race of your big truck while driving or performing monster truck stunts. Best Truck Game for real Truck Driver to drive high power vehicle. Monster Truck Off road Stunt Games are quite unique and challenging for the 3D Truck Driving Game Lovers because you are handling Mega Trucks on rough roads with extra engine force of Heavy Duty Truck. Offroad Monster Truck Steel Game is packed with multiple High Power Real Trucks to drive in mountain and also on off road narrow roads where perfectly designed stunts are awaiting real Truck 3d Drivers. Free Driving Simulator Game is simple to understand you have to drive you real truck and collect all check points alongside the roadway to clear levels. 3d Truck Driving Simulator game is packed with multiple real heavy monster trucks and also offer two different environment one of them will test you truck stunt skills and other will test you driving or truck racing skills. Its time to take adventure to next level with New Monster Truck Steel Titans Truck 3D Game. whether you love or not Big Wheels Truck called Monster Trucks once you played this Best Truck Game designed very trickily you will love this truck driving Free Simulation Game. Truck 3d Driver get ready to test your skills with Heavy Monster Trucks by performing realistic stunts and also you have to drive your Steel Titans like a pro Monster Truck Driver. Most creative and challenging Truck Driving Game ready to challenge legends to perform Monster Truck Driving and performing real stunts. Stunts in simulation games have extra attraction for truck driver because it demand more grip on steering of big monster truck
instructions: W is for go forward, A for left and D for right , S for back and handbreak with Space.

title: Real Bike Race
description: Experience the motorcycle racing with unparalleled graphics! Try our newly designed physics engine from scooters to super sports bike with a variety of controls and handling. A global contest that riders dream of! Race against players around the world in GP Modes based off of the actual MOTO GP Championship. Experience super realism in the palm of your hand, release your racing instincts, and break the limits of speed!
instructions: press W for move forward, press A for turn left, press S for break, press D for turn right and press Shiftbutton for Nos.

title: Canoe Sprint
description: Summer sport hobbies are good for health like cycling in parks, fishing, real canoeing in ocean and river crossing. We bring you canoe racing simulator 2021 rowing power canoe simulator 2021 game one of the best paddle board rowing ferry racing games 2k21.
instructions: Hold & Drag to control canoe and collect team members to speed up your canoe!

title: BBQ Skewers
description: This is a very fun puzzle sorting game. The sorting puzzle game that is popular all over the world and the creativity of grilling skewers are full of fun and make people love it!
instructions: Tap and Click

title: Gunner Runner
description: Make your gun flip using it's recoil and fly as far as you can! How to play this infinite gun flipping game: — Upgrade your favorite weapon; — Unlock awesome skin for it; — Hit play button; — Shoot at the right moment to keep moving up! — Pick up useful bonuses (ammo and boosters)! — Go as far as you can! — Collect coins to unlock new guns and skins! It's easy! Tap, shoot and then flip your gun! Be the best shooter!
instructions: Tap to shoot gun and flip.

title: Rambo Hit Em Up
description: You will play as a Rambo heroes and try to kill all zombies in variables map. The monster will always find a way to defeat you, survive and try to save the world.
instructions: Click (or tap with mobile) any where in game area to shoot

title: Colors Bubble Shooter
description: This is one of the best shooter games that are simple and easy to learn, perfect for families to enjoy! Match at least three bubbles of the same color to pop them and clear them off the board. Mind your angles as you bounce bubbles off the wall to hit the hard-to-reach spots. Use lightning and sun bombs as boosts to clear whole sections, and thaw the ice blocks by clearing adjacent bubbles. Keep on popping until you run out of bubbles!
instructions: Aim, match and smash all the balls in this relaxing color-matching adventure.

title: Zombie Survival
description: Zombie Survival is fun html5 game suitable for all zombie lovers. The aim of the game is simple. You need to get our cute little Zombie to the platform area to clear the level and enter a new one. It is not an easy task! You have to calculate with the bouncing. Click or tap on the objects to remove them of the stage. Do not fall out off the screen! Zombie Survival is a logic game for kids of all ages. Do not hasitate and start play. Have fun young survivor. Come back for more free games.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Stickdoll : God Of Archery
description: This game is about the eternal battle between "Flame" representing the power of Fire, "Gargle" representing the power of Poison and "Ophelia", the representative of goodness in the Stickdoll universe. First of all, combat equipment is collected before the battle arena. These equipments are armor, arrow and random item bubbles. But be careful, this bubble will not always be useful. After the equipment is collected, the battle arena is entered and the collected arrows are fired in turn. If there is no winner in the cutthroat competition, 3 rounds will continue. At the end of these 3 rounds, the battle with the most health becomes the winner. You can play this game against the computer or you can play it comfortably with your friends.
instructions: Player 1: To Move: “W, A, S, D” , To Throw The Arrow: “Space” ( Make sure you set the power bar well before shooting.). Player 2: To Move: “Arrow Keys”, To Throw The Arrow: “K”(Make sure you set the power bar well before shooting.).On Mobile: To Move: “Hold The Finger Pressed In The Direction You Will Move”, To Throw The Arrow: “Just Touch”

title: Rush Race
description: Enjoy the driving experience with most realistic way now!Drive fast and overtake.Try not to bump into other cars while driving.Check out different car models to get various feelings.
instructions: Tag & Hold to drive the car

title: MMA Fighters Jigsaw
description: MMA Fighters Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game online.

title: Catch The Letters and Create The Words
description: Kids can learn 50 words in this game. Players can catch the moving letters and collect to build the correct word. This game is fun to play and learn. Enjoy this game!
instructions: Catch the letter and drag and drop the letters to create the words.

title: Pull the Pin Rescue
description: Pull the Pin Rescue is a rescue game that you need to pull out the pin in the right order and rescue a trapped guy. Once failed the young guy will be dangerous. Focuses more on your strategy and saves him.
instructions: Tap and slide to play.

title: Astro Rush
description: Race through space and dodge the obstacles at breakneck speed. Take control of two meteorites in this fast-paced high score game while you rush through a trippy galaxy. Rotate the meteorites through the obstacles. If you fail once, you will have one meteorite left and switch from rotating to dodging controls. You can play in normal mode or in three different wireframe modes.
instructions: - With 2 meteorites: press AD or left and right arrow keys to rotate - With 1 meteorite: press AD or left and right arrow keys to dodge - You can invert the controls in the main menu

title: Airport Rush
description: You own the airport and now have to manage it! You get to manage the landing and take-off of all planes at the airport! Put your alertness and management skills at work and make sure a safe journey for everyone.
instructions: Tap or click on the circular countdown near the plane to get it moving. If you don't click, plane will move once the countdown is complete. Planes stop for refill or other activates. Safely manage parking and take off for maximum planes!

title: Mahjong Ornaments
description: Welcome to Mahjong Ornament, a delightful twist on the classic Mahjong game! Your goal is to eliminate pairs of similar items, but there's a catch – you can only select pairs with an open left or right side. Don't worry; hints are available to assist you. Dive into this unique version of the game as you connect matching tiles while racing against the clock. Can you clear the board before time runs out? Any unused hints and saved time will be awarded as a bonus. Enjoy the challenge!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Zumba Ocean
description: Get better at one of the most popular puzzle games. Shoot gems and try to complete all the levels with three stars in each level. This gem game is easy to play and addicting at the same time.
instructions: Tap to shoot. Match 3 or more same-coloured gems to eliminate them. Destroy all gems in the chain before it hits the end. Tap the cannon to swap between the current and the next gem. Use power-ups to clear the board faster.

title: Japanese Racing Cars Jigsaw
description: This is jigsaw game with images of Japanese Racing Cars. These cars are known around the world for their speed and their drifting. We selected beautiful and interesting pictures with Japanese cars. Choose how many pieces you want to divide the image. It can be in 24, 48 or 100 pieces. Then assemble the image to get a picture of a Japanese race car. Solve first image to unlock next one. This game have 12 images. Play all levels and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Trials Ice Ride
description: Ride a motorbike on icy outdoor trials track and pass many complex obstacles. Keep the trials bike balanced and avoid falling off the motorcycle. Complete the track in the shortest time to get higher score points and unlock various achievements.
instructions: Desktop: Arrow keys or W,A,S,D to control the motorbike. Mobile: Use on-screen buttons to ride and balance the motorcycle.

title: Zombie Slayer
description: The Zombie Slayer game is a survival game that includes various missions. Sometimes you will protect a hostage and sometimes a line. Don't forget to improve your weapons to continue in a total of 100 different levels. In difficult times, use grenades and air strikes!
instructions: Move: WASD - Fire: K - Knife: L - Grenade: H, Air Strake: J, Change Weapon: Q

title: Zumba Challenge
description: Shoot all bubbles in Zumba Challenge, make combinations of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to remove them. Remove all bubbles before they can reach the end to go to the next level. Zumba Challenge features 15 challenging levels that will increase in difficulty.
instructions: Tap or click to shoot the bubbles, make combinations of 3 or more, remove all bubbles.

title: BTS Pony Coloring Book
description: BTS Pony Coloring Book is awesome game for children of all ages that loves to escape the distractions and troubles of everyday life by focusing on the mindfulness and creativity within coloring. Whether you or your child enjoys drawing pictures, making beautiful art come to life with vibrant colors, well this coloring book is the perfect choice! Have fun coloring!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: GT Ghost Racing
description: Choose your vehicle and race through the various tracks compete against the ghosts of racing legends to prove you are the best of the best and collect all the stars! Race through the seasons, night tracks, winter tracks and futuristic neon tracks.
instructions: Keyboard:Arrow Up = AccelerateArrow Down = Break / ReverseL/R Arrows = Steer Left or RightTouchscreen: On screen buttons

title: Trivia! Best family quiz
description: General knowledge trivia is a very interesting and popular trivia guessing game. In this game you can proof that you are clever and train your brain! Choose the correct answer from 4 possible ones. Tons of questions are waiting. This online quiz is impossible to lose ! If the answer is incorrect, you can choose another option . When the answer is found, a pop-up message in a humorous form will tell the details. The quiz has 1800 interesting tasks that will not let you get bored and broaden your horizons. The game is suitable for both adults and children.
instructions: Mouse Touch

title: Europe Soccer Cup 2021
description: Twenty four best soccer teams in europe are competing to get the first place in the 2020 Europe Soccer Cup, Do you think you can choose a team and do it?
instructions: Computer - mouse | Mobile - Touch

title: Adam and Eve Go 3
description: In Adam and Eve GO, despite the dangers and the challenges of the prehistoric times, love found a way to blossom! Adam loves Eve and he'll do anything to make her happy. Join this adventurous caveman through the multiple fun and challenging levels of this game! Can you help him overcome the obstacles and bring a nice flower to his significant other? Dinosaurs, traps, and many other dangers are waiting for you in this addictive game! Your objective is to complete each level by collecting a rose and bringing it to Eve. The game features 15 different levels for you to complete. Start from the first level. Use the arrow keys to move around and climb up and down the ladders. Be careful though! You'll encounter many different traps and obstacles. You need a way to bypass them. Either standing on pressure plates or using other objects would clear your way. You'll see fruits laying around in each level. Try to collect as many of them as possible, as these give you extra points. Approach other characters and give them what they want to gain items or even keys! Keys are required to open doors so you can reach Eve after collecting the rose. Enjoy!
instructions: You can use the arrow keys to control Adam. Use the left and right arrow keys to move around, and the up and down arrow keys to climb up and down the ladders.

title: Math Merge
description: Drag the numbers in the grid to merge them. There are the following categories of pieces: Roman numbers, polygons, fractions, Mayan numbers and cardinal numbers. You can solve mathematical challenges and get game pieces or coins.
instructions: Touchscreen/Mouse: Drag and drop the pieces in the grid.

title: Lady Tower
description: Your boy is waiting for you! Rise high and get it! A game for Baddy ladies! Features: Wonderful graphics Tons of different levels Easy to play and hard to master
instructions: Tap to jump onto men to collect them and create longer tower.

title: Gunner
description: Grab your gun and take out many different opponents. Tap to shoot! In Gunner game you must get as high as possible. Use your coins to buy better weapons and many different skins. Take a look at your blacklist and take out special enemies.
instructions: Tap to shoot.

title: Amazing Sticky Hex – Hexa Block Puzzle Games
description: Play Amazing Sticky Hex – Hexa Block Puzzle Games online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Chess Mania
description: Make use of your best chess strategy, analyze your next move and improve your chess skills. Climb the tower of 400 levels and face more difficult challenges! Complete all achievements and become the chess grandmaster.
instructions: Tap buttons and chess pieces for corresponding actions. Standard chess rules apply. Checkmate your opponent to complete your current level. Complete achievements to unlock more flags.

title: SS Euro Cup 2021
description: Soccer Skills Euro Cup 2021 edition is the ultimate web based cross-platform soccer game! 11 versus 11 in fast paced 3D action bestowing unrivaled skills.
instructions: Press/click screen and drag to move the pointer to direct your player and then release to shoot the ball.

title: Mahjong Digital
description: Mahjong Digital is a fun and exciting game of Mahjong in the digital world! Use your skills, strategy and luck to complete the game! There are some handy features to help you complete the full game.
instructions: Make Mahjong matches and complete all the levels!
